cz.cvut.fel.omo.factory

Class ProductionLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fel.omo.factory.Visitable
      • cz.cvut.fel.omo.factory.ProductionLine

  • public class ProductionLine
extends Visitable
    Production where cars are assembled, machines are set, workers are assigned to machines, changed, and they work and rest. Repairmen repair machines.

    • Method Detail

      • setProductionLine

        public void setProductionLine(CarType carType,
                              MachineStorage machineStorage,
                              java.util.ArrayList<MachineType> sequence,
                              MaterialStorage materialStorage)
                       throws MachineMissing
        Sets machines in order based on sequence. Assigns workers to needed machines. Puts back unneeded machines.
        Parameters:
        carType - - car to be created
        machineStorage - - machines to take and return machines to
        sequence - - sequence of machines
        materialStorage - - material storage to take material from
        Throws:
        MachineMissing - - machine needed in a sequence is not present

      • launch

        public void launch(CarStorage carStorage,
                   MaterialStorage materialStorage)
        Launch the production line. Creates cars using machines. Checks if machines break and repairs them. Checks if workers are tired and if so, changes them. Puts cars to car storage.
        Parameters:
        carStorage - - where to put cars
        materialStorage - - material storage of machines. To check material availability.
